data.name: Archaeologist
data.description: Fragments are remnants of the past… Trade them with me, and I’ll share artifacts of immense historical value — and the rarest of resources.

data.name: Cultist Wizard
data.description: Bring me your corrupted gems! I’ll trade them for a selection of powerful treasures.

data.name: Fish Merchant
data.description: If it swims or helps catch what swims, I’ll buy it or sell it.

data.name: Gemstone Merchant
data.description: Need mining tools or got some to sell? I handle all that stuff.

data.name: Herbal Merchant
data.description: Need potions, ingredients, or alchemy tools? I’ve got what you need — or I’ll buy what you’ve got!

data.name: Nomadic Merchant
data.description: Everything has value to someone. I just make the exchange happen.

data.name: Rune Vendor
data.description: Looking for runes? I’ve got what you need — just bring some gold!

data.name: Sandwhisper Trader
data.description: The SandwhisperTrader swaps shiny loot for your hard-stolen Sandwhisper Coins, arrr!

data.name: Tailor
data.description: I specialize in skins, hides, fabrics, and fibers. Bring me raw materials, and I’ll trade you refined, higher-quality ones.

data.name: Tasks Trader
data.description: Resources for task coins — fair trade, every time.

data.name: Timber Merchant
data.description: Got logs or tools to trade? I buy and sell anything woodcutting-related!
